Navigation
Name Tutor/Maintenance/Adding
Synopsis Add a concept to a course
Description There are basically two scenarios for adding a new concept, depending on where its contents come from. If the concept is going to be completely contained in the course itself:
  • Select a concept that is suitable as parent for the new concept:
  • Click the New Subconcept button.
  • An editing windows is opened: add the name and other information about the new concept.
  • Press the Save button. The new concept is now part of the course.
If the concept involves remote content (i.e., the concepts are described in rascallibrary files), then a ConceptMapping has to be added as explained in SourceCodeMarkup.
